description: Attach Signed and Stamped Copy of Invoice Copy from the Customer
label: Invoice Copy
name: Sales Invoice-invoice_copy

default:
a. Visual checkup for any mechanical damage, rusting, or any other defect that is visible
b. Cleaning and lubrication of mechanical parts like motors, gas springs, solenoids, bearings and other mechanical parts.
c. Carry out the prescribed safety checks according to the manufacturer's requirements.
d. Provide written report and checklist of work carried out
e. Notify customer of any items requiring further attention
f. Maintain a log book for documentation of test results and service history for retention by customer
label: Scope of Service
name: Maintenance Schedule-custom_scope_of_service

default:
a. Emergency services are limited to genuine equipment failures only and will be attended during our normal working hours, within 48 hours (working days) from the time the call being received.
b. Repairs arising out of mishandling or negligent handling, unit relocation, etc., are not covered.
c. All replacement parts are chargeable on maintenance only service contracts.
d. Breakdowns or issues arising from the usage of suboptimal water/air quality are not covered.
e.
The date and time of the preventive maintenance will be informed in advance and the customer should avail the equipment to our service team.
The customer should maintain the equipment according to the instructions given by the manufacturer and our service team
g. Contract fees are non-refundable. Maximum liability of the company is limited to the contract value.
label: Service Conditions
name: Maintenance Schedule-custom_service_conditions
